title: Searching music
text: So I download capcutToday and there‚Äôs no problem with this so far but I just wish that you could be able to search up the music because I feel like some of the songs on there aren‚Äôt what I‚Äôm looking for for the video that I making for Tiktok or for YouTubeAnd I don‚Äôt really like switching through other apps to add the certain type of music that I want or just have to go and TikTok and screen record and then like at the music from the video so I just wish that you could make an option where you can search up whatever song that she whines that I have an added on other platforms and even though you can do Apple Music I don‚Äôt have Apple Music so I just feel like that you should have the option to be able to search up the song instead of having to pick whatever songs are on there even though don‚Äôt give me wrong the songs are not bad they are very good but I just wish that I could listen to some songs with lyrics and something that is more me so I hope you see this and I hope I enjoy this app even more.

title: Pretty good but could use some changes!
text:
Don‚Äôt get me wrong, this app is great! It is 100% free, NO watermark, and has some really good features! It built-in stickers and filters that are well and good. Also, did I mention, IT HAS MULTIPLE LAYERS!! That‚Äôs friekin incredible!! I tested and it has up to five other layers of video or photo! This is one of the only apps on mobile that actually has multiple layers and is free!
Onto the not so good things...It has most of the basic features you need EXCEPT good Volume, the volume feature is really bad, you can barely turn the volume down it only sounds SLIGHTLY quieter when you‚Äôre almost all the way at the ‚Äú0‚Äù volume thing. Also, in my opinion there should be more options for volume customization maybe such as ‚Äúaudio stabilization‚Äù or something like that. Also the slow-down effects and the voice effects could use work. It has some really useful filters with camcorder and 90‚Äôs effects built into the app which is really cool. The transitions are actually surprisingly un-cheesy. I wanted to say thank you to the person who made this app! It is a really good app and definitely could use some changes but overall It‚Äôs really great!

I really enjoy editing on CapCut but there are some things I think need to be fixed or added. ‚Ä¢there are lots of bugs, like when I try to import a photo it says that there aren‚Äôt any photos. Another bug is when I add an in animation then remove it then add a combo animation it doesn‚Äôt add it. ‚Ä¢I think hue shift should be added, there is the rainbow negative affect but it just looks to chaotic. I think there‚Äôs already a option for hue shift but I‚Äôd rather it be an effect. ‚Ä¢a search option for effects. Im pretty sure there used to be an option where you could search effects but it was removed. Please add it back, it takes forever to look for effects I want to use especially since there are a lot of them. ‚Ä¢I think the motion blur should be fixed, when I add motion blur to my edits there will be random spots on it which I don‚Äôt like. Sometimes it looks good but other times it does not. ‚Ä¢along with a search option for effects I think there should be one for animations also. 
‚Ä¢I think you should be able to overlay animations.
Overall I really enjoy using this app but I feel like these need to be fixed and added. :D

title: I am in shock of how good this app is.
text: I started editing when I was 8, pretty much 3 years ago. I couldn‚Äôt find any editing apps and i didn‚Äôt know they existed. So I was editing with iMovie, the app that comes with your iPad? Yea that one. It helped me improve my editing lots! But it wasn‚Äôt really good‚Ä¶ in 4th grade my friend told me about capcut and that she loved how good it was, I was still with iMovie. Me and my friend (not gonna mention her name) are gacha tubers and we like editing so she recommended me capcut, I said no since my mom didn‚Äôt let me have to many apps and I already had 5 apps (games) in the summer of 5th grade I started thinking about downloading capcut. I asked my mom about it and she said ‚Äúok‚Äù and that was weird because she is ridiculously overprotective so I was happy, I immediately called my friend and she told me everything about capcut, the tips and tricks.. Im a fast learner so it took me around 3 months to handle perfectly capcut. Now I‚Äôm in 7th grade and My editing has definitely improved, and all thanks to capcut. Thank you so much for inventing this awesome app I love it! üíúüíú

title: Amazing but‚Ä¶
text: I just want to start with, this app is amazing! It could use a few changes though. For instance, there is a template section, which is like TikTok. This is fine, but it‚Äôs just that kids who discover the section could find stuff that they shouldn‚Äôt know about. Like gory or scary things. (This app has nothing inappropriate in it, like nothing I‚Äôm glad) so I think that they should put a age restriction for parents to set up on the app so that children can use it carefully and don‚Äôt get involved with things they‚Äôre parents don‚Äôt want for them. Another problem I have is when I click on a template it shows a different template. I‚Äôm not sure if it‚Äôs my phone or the app, but please fix it. Also, I think there should be more edit resources, like more things to edit with. I think that using the same things over and over again are pretty boring so if you could add new things I‚Äôd be really pleased! Now, I‚Äôm not trying to make this one of your hour long reviews so I‚Äôll end it here. I think you should get this app it‚Äôs very useful!

title: There is one thing to fix
text: I‚Äôve been using Capcut for about two years now, and have noticed one thing I want them to change. When I started everything was free to use. You could do anything, and it cost nothing. But lately, they‚Äôve added Capcut pro. Which I don‚Äôt mind, they need some way to make a profit. But they‚Äôve been taking some of the old features and made them Capcut pro exclusives. They have also made over half of the features only usable with Capcut pro. And it‚Äôs annoying seeing all of these things that I have to pay for. Whenever I want to add an animation for my text, there is SO many animations with Capcut pro. And some of my old favorites are Capcut pro. Don‚Äôt get me wrong, I love Capcut and will most likely continue to use it, but if this keeps up, and more than 3/4 of the app is Capcut pro, I may find another app to use. I think there are  two things they need to do to fix it. Add new features, but make some free, and some on Capcut pro. And also don‚Äôt mix the Capcut pro stuff with the free stuff, have another section for the paid stuff. I think if those two things are put in, the app would be a 5 stars for me!

title: I love it but I do have suggestions
text:
CapCut is an AMAZING editing app for new beginner editors, people don‚Äôt see it as an editing app but it is when you get to see more of the like transitions, effects etc. there‚Äôs so many things you can do with this app though there are presets you can use those presets and combine them with other presets. 

Now my suggestions. I think if there were graphs and making your own transitions would be AMAZING, maybe if there were also motion blur in effects or like mirror like titles in alight motion it would be great and maybe even pass alight motion, and lastly maybe you could add like titles for your project incase you are deleting projects (for storage) so you don‚Äôt delete something you don‚Äôt want to delete.

 This app is already amazing so if you‚Äôre a beginner editor you should use CapCut it‚Äôs amazing it has great transitions, effects etc more things than alight motion has but alight motion is still advance with the graphs etc. So you should start with CapCut honestly before using any other big editing apps like alight motion or AE.

title: Works very well, but there are one or two things
text:
I love how easy it is to use. It‚Äôs good for editing a quick video, or a long AMV. I‚Äôve used it for edits, AMV‚Äôs even a stop motion. There are just a couple of things keeping this app from perfection however.
Like with most editing apps, there is a premium. Like other apps, you can see the cool stuff that you get with premium. You can apply it to your video to see how it works. But sometimes, you can forget that you applied it. When I try to save the video, it tells me that I‚Äôm using pro, and I have to sift through the entire thing to find out what effect I accidentally left on. I think that it would be better if it was not possible to leave the effect on after applying it. Maybe you shouldn‚Äôt be able to see apply it at all. 
There also seem to be more PRO effects than normal ones. As a teenager without a job, I do not want to have to pay money to make edits for fun, and I think that the majority of the effects and stuff should be free. 
That‚Äôs pretty much all, some of this might just be me, but that‚Äôs what I think about CapCut

title: Great app

title: CHANGED MY LIFE
text: CapCut is the most open and close to being social media app I‚Äôve ever experienced. Although some content is around the 17+ area, CapCut makes me feel like I belong. I can watch other peoples templates without having to like them or get an account, and I can see what other people think of it too. This app has also moved my life and multitudinous ways. it has been a place where I can vent to others and show my innermost feelings. The most important thing that I love about CapCut is the community. People will always be there for you through the haters and quite honestly this app has never been better for me I would love to put in a good word for knows everything, one of the CapCut creators. This individual has done so much for me and giving me information on stuff and just being a good person. his/her account is family friendly and I gotta hand it to him/her for helping others too. CapCut is a life changing app and can help you feel better in with the world and it‚Äôll also help you stand out.

title: Read if your thinking about getting this app:
text: Capcut is an amazing editing app. I use it to film my videos mainly but occasionally I will edit videos. They have had a lot of amazing updates in the past months. I only have one constructive criticism.  When I film my videos on Capcut and then try and save the video or choose to edit it, I will find that my entire video is black and that is all I can see. For me this is frustrating for this is irreversible. And I work hard to create quality videos for my socials. And when this happens I have two choices: choose to try and recreate it or simply give up. Even though this is a pretty serious issue that I‚Äôve had to deal with when using Capcut. I would still recommend this app. The quality of filming is impeccable. There are loads of tutorials to help you edit videos as well. You can also treat Capcut like your own social media too with the profile tool. You are now allowed to post edits on Capcut (with requirements that need to be met for the Capcut Creator Guidelines). And when creating videos you can save it without a watermark.

title: Amazing!
text:
So if you‚Äôve seen the ads for this app, you‚Äôre probably like ‚Äúthey‚Äôre just saying that, it‚Äôs not that easy‚Äù but no, it really is! CapCut is definitely the easiest editing software I‚Äôve used and you probably don‚Äôt need a tutorial for how to use it because of how simple it is! In just a few minutes you‚Äôll be making unbelievable edits you didn‚Äôt think you could make, it‚Äôs really just the best app for editing if you‚Äôre just starting out, looking for something simpler, or anything else!
Of course it has its flaws, like when you‚Äôre selecting an animation it‚Äôll lag a bit until you select the animation which is a little annoying because if you don‚Äôt like it you have to deselect the animation tool, but doesn‚Äôt really affect the quality or anything, and sometimes it‚Äôs hard to time things right when it tries to put it in place for you, but overall just an amazing app!
I‚Äôve made such amazing edits with this app, I can‚Äôt believe how well they turned out and how easy it was to make them.

title: The reason why it's a 3.
text: So, I love this app. It's awesome. I learned how to use it and I've had it for almost 2 years now. Then, I hit a speed bump. I got a new update and then I couldn't look at any of the templates or projects or anything I made anymore!! I was so sad! So, in much despair, I deleted it and then redownloaded it in hopes that it would start working again.. but it didn't work. I could only make projects. I couldn't look at other people's templates, I couldn't make templates. Like when I tried to, it would just bring me to a loading screen and not move from there. I sat there waiting for it for at least 10 minutes one time!! Again, I deleted it and redownloaded it. That time, I couldn't do ANYTHING except for make projects!! NOTHING was working!! I was so upset! I love/loved CapCut and now I can't even use it! I am still very upset about it. It even says that CapCut works on my phone (the one I'm making this review on)!! So, could I please get some help on this?  I love CapCut and I don't wanna not have it forever.

title: love the app buttttt
text:
ok so i love this app, don't get me wrong. it has great features, fun fonts, and more. it has a membership system, but it's not unreasonable. and you can look for templates or apply to be a creator.
    the only thing i don't like about the app is that they update it EVERY. OTHER. title: Pretty simple, just a few problems
text: I‚Äôve been using this app for a while now, and it‚Äôs pretty easy to manage! There are little captions under effects and show you what they do before you use them. It‚Äôs honestly pretty easy for new comers, and it really just depends on how you use the app to make your edits. But there are a few problems as well, I‚Äôve seen people take others edits and people are pretty disappointed when they realize they can‚Äôt use the template. Second of all, most of the good texts and effects are in the premium pack. If you really want to make good edits, then I recommend getting it, because it really helps! One thing that I did want to note is that when you make an edit and post it, make sure to add your own watermark so if people steal it, then other people can call them out. In general, the app is great and simple which is perfect for people who just need or want something a bit easier to manage and have fun while doing something they enjoy!

title: suggestions
text:
CapCut is great, but there are some down hills on it, so CapCut i'd  appreciate if you'd read this and take in some suggestions of what to add to your app. not only will these suggestions hopefully boost your ratings and downloads but could also help the improvement of editing and of course better quality! 1: smoother slow-mo. i will admit the slow-mo is pretty bad. its laggy and just not very good. 2: graphs, OMG i swear CapCut, graphs would be SOO helpful! not only for premade animations but for keyframes and overlays! it would help make animation smoother and fit with the kind of theme people are trying to do, and over all easier. 3: this one isnt very important, but being able to add overlays more than once at a time. if someone is planning on adding quite a few overlays to their videos its frustrating having to add them one at a time. 4: the abilty to add splice to text without having to make a video and overlay to your other one!
 
anyways these were just suggestions, but i do know many people agree with me so CapCut, please add these things! minus that this app is really good!

title: Great with iMovie but some stuff could be different
text:
OK, so first of all, it works beautifully! I dislike the fact that sometimes it kicks you out of the app but that might just be my phone. Also with all the people saying that you can't upload videos over fifteen minutes long, have you ever heard of "Video merging"??? Also I found that if there is something like a background or something like that you can use iMovie for an easier upload (Might just be me but it kept crashing). I also use iMovie for videos over fifteen minutes long so they can be, over fifteen minutes long (XD). But I do have a suggestion with the app creators:

Could you please put in an option to start a template without having a video? It would be a lot easier to record straight from the app then having to do the process of recording, then uploading, then cropping everything and all that jazz. It's just so much easier to record straight from the app! But in total, if it wasn't for the recording thing I give it a solid 4/5 stars. 

(By the way if a developer reads this and puts in thanks so much!)

title: Pretty helpful but needs a little update on the size

title: Why I love CapCut
text:
I love CapCut so much! The reason why is because you can make so many videos of your own and they can be as long as you want, the app also gives you PLENTY of filters and effects to choose from. You can also use one of the templates other people make and put your own photos and videos in the template you choose! You can also change the text in some videos/templates to make them fit the topic I want. Another cool feature that I like about CapCut is that you can go up to the camera icon and you can make videos from scratch on CapCut. You can make POVs‚Äô/Point of View(s), funny videos, ect. And you can go ahead and add whatever face filter you want or anything really! Heck, you can even save your videos or your can save them so they can go to your photo app :)
Another cool thing I like about this app is that it showed you tutorials
on how to make a really cool edit to your video!
There is a lot more information you‚Äôll find out when you get the app!

title: It‚Äôs okay
text:
It‚Äôs an OK app and for video editing it‚Äôs pretty reliable but if you try and use their templates they tend to get corrupted and turn black and stop working also if you try and select photos after you select one it will take you back to the top and if you‚Äôve selected a certain folder it‚Äôll take you out of that folder but it doesn‚Äôt do that with videos. So adding videos to edit is really easy but if you want to add photos it‚Äôs going to take a lot of time or you need to go into your Photos app and favorite all of them first and then try and open them one by one from the favorite album but it still sends you to the top after each selection so it‚Äôs very tedious and time-consuming. I originally used InShot for all my video editing and then switched over to CapCut after learning about it on Tiktok but I think I‚Äôll switch back to InShot now. Essentially they feel like they do the same things but InShot never fails me or glitches while CapCut glitches often.
Also I‚Äôve never had an issue saving a large file from InShot but I have had several issues saving large files from CapCut.

title: Capcut has flaws
text: Capcut is overall a great app, but there are some things I wish were different. I wish Capcut had more magic filters. You see them everywhere yet Capcut doesn‚Äôt have them. It is quite aggravating. Also, sometimes I‚Äôll make an edit and another day I‚Äôll come back to look at it and see it is no longer there. In times like these I wonder if it glitched or if I deleted it by accident. I really believe there should be a recently deleted section for if you delete something by accident. I also do not appreciate how a lot of features cost money, For example, every single pride sticker is in the pro version. My friend was upset about this. She said the exact words, ‚Äú Why do I need to pay to be gay?!‚Äù I quite agree with her. Not to mention all of the animations. Half of the good ones are with the pro version! It tends to get on ones nerves. I really would greatly appreciate if you made less things pro and I‚Äôm sure a lot of other people would too. Whoever is reading this , thank you for your time.

title: Its great, theres just a bunch of glitches right now

I have no idea if people are going through this or its just me but ive been experiencing some glitches related to the app. When i try to zoom in, it‚Äôll constantly reset from where I previously was, and when i try cropping it to another place on my video or photo it‚Äôll do the exact same thing. Ive also tried putting video over another to add effects to my video, but the video seems invisible for some reason, and instead of playing the video without sound when scrolling through the bar, it‚Äôll just cut into frames and make it impossible for me to time things correctly. Again, i have no idea if other users are facing this but please i beg you to fix this. Its starting to turn my 1-2 hours pf editing to 3-4, its driving me NUTS; but overall i really enjoy using this app!

title: Two Bugs
text: I‚Äôve been using this editing app for a while and it‚Äôs the best for simple edits and minor complex edits. But recently, I‚Äôve had a problem with the text, where if a word has an apostrophe, then it adds extra space between the letter and word. For example, if I were to type ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt‚Äù it would look like, ‚ÄúDon‚Äô t‚Äù. Whether I type it or let auto correct type it out, it still ends up like that. Unsure if it‚Äôs just a problem to me or anyone else, but if you can fix this bug then it would be a lot better. I mean, it just seems weird when text doesn‚Äôt have an apostrophe, especially in words such as ‚ÄúYou‚Äôve, You‚Äôre, and They‚Äôre‚Äù. So if you can, please fix this bug. Also, in a recent edit I made it added [ and ] to my text. So it would look like, [‚ÄúOh yeah! I went there!‚Äù] *Not what I said in the edit but it is an example*. It happened once I re-entered my edit to continue editing. I deleted the [ ] but once I saved it, it still appeared. So I‚Äôm really unsure if it is just a bug or a problem with my phone. But if you guys can fix it, then it would be much help.

title: Amazing! And a suggestion!
text:
Capcut is absolutely amazing, whoever made this deserves a gold medal!! I especially appreciate how when Capcut added the Pro feature, they didn‚Äôt make effects, text animations, or anything like that that was already free a Pro feature. Instead they added new pro features instead of taking the old free features and stuffing them into the pro feature. I‚Äôve seen so many editing apps make things that were already free cost money and it has never gone good for them, Capcut seems to actually care about it‚Äôs users. I also love how it‚Äôs so easy to navigate, nothing is put into unnecessary confusing sections, it‚Äôs all right there and it‚Äôs easy to get used to. 

I do have a suggestion though!! 

Me and My friend would LOVE to make a project together, and I‚Äôm sure many other people would too!! What if there was a way to share projects with others, like adding them based off of their email or capcut account, then both people could edit that specific project. So if one person makes a change to it, it shows up on the other person‚Äôs side and they can edit it together! So both could be on a project at the same time and collaborate. I think this would be so cool and I‚Äôd love if Capcut took it into consideration. 

Overall, Capcut is such a great editing app for both beginners and people who are more advanced, and I‚Äôd recommend it to anyone starting or to any advanced editors who want a simpler editing app.

title: Stunning! but‚Ä¶
text: When I first started video editing, this was the second app I stumbled across, and I haven‚Äôt switched since. I almost immediately understood the controls and began making edits. The effects are all amazing, (shakes, transitions, video effects,  animations, etc.) but could be more advanced. While you can export a video after having used one animation then add another in a different project, that is extremely tedious. All I‚Äôm asking for is smoother, more professional looking animations (mainly shake animations that don‚Äôt look choppy üò≠) Still, I have nothing against this app and highly recommend it. The only problem I‚Äôve had is with the smooth slow motion effect making weird, green frames within the video clip your trying to apply the effect to. Otherwise, everything works amazingly. It always blows me away to see what people can create in this app, and what continues to be added. I won‚Äôt switch editing softwares for a LONG time. ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Was great, until‚Ä¶
text: I‚Äôve been using CapCut for a while now to make sports edits and have been doing pretty well.. The problem I have, is that CapCut is starting to make a lot of stuff ‚ÄúCapCut Pro‚Äù. I know they‚Äôre trying to make a profit but they‚Äôre making the simplest effects pro. Example: Vibration Flash, a simple effect that flashes a second of light and disappears. I‚Äôve used this effect in many of my edits but now that they made this pro. It wouldn‚Äôt feel as simplistic anymore, and I would start having to remake the effect with other effects or overlays. It really wouldn‚Äôt just feel the same anymore as I have used it for so many of my edits. And it wouldn‚Äôt feel as simplistic, and I have a feeling this could be a problem to a lot of beginner editors who are just getting into editing. Because they see an effect they like but can‚Äôt use it because it‚Äôs pro. I‚Äôm just sharing my opinion, because I am a little frustrated on this ‚ÄúCapCut Pro‚Äù subscription. And it really wouldn‚Äôt feel the same or as simplistic (again) as used to. Just sharing my thoughts.

title: i love it, has a few issues
text: i absolutely love capcut and would 100% recommend it to beginner editors. it‚Äôs free, simple and CAN make amazing edits! a few issues - 1) it‚Äôs VERY laggy when trying to watch your edit, you have to save it to your camera roll to view it properly. 2) (this is in my opinion the worst one) whenever i layer effects on top of each other (i normally add some sort of blur for the transitions, then add soft, noise 2, nostalgic light and edge glow) my video looks weirdly glitchy, like there‚Äôs weird lines over it. it‚Äôs really upsetting because i cant use the effects i want at all, even if i save it to my camera roll and add it to a new project, it still does it. the clips are always great quality so it‚Äôs not a problem with that. please fix this. some things i wish were in capcut- i wish we could see how much time we spent on an edit and i wish we could have more layers. it‚Äôs so hard to make candy style edits because you have to export it every four seconds. but overall, i love the app.
